analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0xf87a7ec94884f44d9de33d36b73f42c7c0dd38b1.sol:
	Contract IEtherToken has payable functions:
	 - deposit (/unique_chucks/23/0xf87a7ec94884f44d9de33d36b73f42c7c0dd38b1.sol#209-210)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

BancorQuickConverter.convertFor has external calls inside a loop:
	- converter = ITokenConverter(smartToken.owner()) (/unique_chucks/23/0xf87a7ec94884f44d9de33d36b73f42c7c0dd38b1.sol#315)

BancorQuickConverter.convertFor has external calls inside a loop:
	- _amount = converter.change(fromToken,toToken,_amount,_minReturn) (/unique_chucks/23/0xf87a7ec94884f44d9de33d36b73f42c7c0dd38b1.sol#322-324)

BancorQuickConverter.convertFor has external calls inside a loop:
	- _amount = converter.change(fromToken,toToken,_amount,1) (/unique_chucks/23/0xf87a7ec94884f44d9de33d36b73f42c7c0dd38b1.sol#322-324)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/23/0xf87a7ec94884f44d9de33d36b73f42c7c0dd38b1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/23/0xf87a7ec94884f44d9de33d36b73f42c7c0dd38b1.sol#1): it allows old versions
